title: Tommy Hilfiger Men's 'COOL SPORT' Quartz Stainless Steel Casual Watch, Color Silver-Toned (Model: 1791348)
feature: Multi-/ stainless steel case / stainless steel bracelet / navy dial
Durable mineral crystal protects watch from scratches
Water resistant to 30m (100ft): in general, withstands splashes or brief immersion in water, but not suitable for swimming or bathing
description: Tommy Hilfiger 1791348 Distinctive textures add eye-catching appeal to this cool, confident multi-function men's watch in solid stainless steel. Featuring a protected crown with etched flag/iconic stripe detail, and sport bezel, the 46mm case is presented on an H-link bracelet with a bold middle row of vertically textured links. Highlighted by a white/blue/grey retrograde-look day indicator at 12 o'clock, the pique-textured blue dial also sports two round sunray sub-eyes - a small 24-hour hand at 9, and a date hand at 6 - and signature red/white/blue accents.
